original_text: And he said to them, “Therefore every scribe who has been trained for the kingdom of heaven is like a master of a house, who brings out of his treasure what is new and what is old.”
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 그러므로 천국의 제자된 서기관마다 마치 새것과 옛것을 그 곳간에서 내오는 집주인과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore every scribe who has been trained for the kingdom of heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 천국에 대한 훈련을 받은 모든 서기관은

sentences.original_text: is like a master of a house,
who brings out of his treasure what is new
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 보물 창고에서 새 것을 꺼내고
